description:
Mikan managed to find Hotaru, but her problems have only just begun. Not only is Mikan picking a fight with the worst kid in school, but the rest of the class won`t have anything to do with her until she can prove she`s an Alice!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alice nanka ni Makete Tamaru ka
No Alice Is Going to Defeat Me
アリスなんかに負けてたまるか☆
